# Rollercoaster Data Exploration!

In this notebook we look at some of the features provided in the rollercoaster dataset which can be found here:  https://www.kaggle.com/robikscube/rollercoaster-database
source.4c3460f1:
# Dataset Features:

Raw data scraped from wikipedia:
- `coaster_name`
- `Length`
- `Speed`
- `Location`
- `Status`
- `Opening date`
- `Type`
- `Manufacturer`
- `Height restriction`
- `Model`
- `Height`
- `Inversions`
- `G-force`
...

## Scrubbed Features
These features were derived from the raw wikipedia data.
- `latitude`
- `longitude`
- `Type_Main`
- `opening_date_clean`
- `speed_mph`
- `height_ft`
- `Inversions_clean`
- `Gforce_clean`
